allowRecoverability(address).details: By default deriving from AragonApp makes it recoverable

params.token: Token address that would be recovered

allowRecoverability(address).return: bool whether the app allows the recovery

canPerform(address,bytes32,uint256[]).details: Check whether an action can be performed by a sender for a particular role on this app
canPerform(address,bytes32,uint256[]).return: Boolean indicating whether the sender has the permissions to perform the action.        Always returns false if the app hasn't been initialized yet.

params._value: The amount of contribution token to be spent
The amount of contribution tokens to be used in that computation

getInitializationBlock().return: Block number in which the contract was initialized

getRecoveryVault().details: Get the recovery vault for the app
getRecoveryVault().return: Recovery vault address for the app

hasInitialized().return: Whether the contract has been initialized by the time of the current block

params._beneficiary: The address of the beneficiary [to whom a percentage of the raised funds is be to be sent]
params._contributionToken: The address of the token to be used to contribute
params._controller: The address of the controller contract
params._exchangeRate: The exchangeRate [= 1/price] at which [bonded] tokens are to be purchased for that presale [in PPM]
params._fundingForBeneficiaryPct: The percentage of the raised contribution tokens to be sent to the beneficiary [instead of the fundraising reserve] when that presale is closed [in PPM]
params._goal: The goal to be reached by the end of that presale [in contribution token wei]
params._openDate: The date upon which that presale is to be open [ignored if 0]
params._period: The period within which to accept contribution for that presale
params._reserve: The address of the reserve [pool] contract
params._supplyOfferedPct: The percentage of the initial supply of [bonded] tokens to be offered during that presale [in PPM]
params._tokenManager: The address of the [bonded] token manager contract
params._vestingCliffPeriod: The period during which purchased [bonded] tokens are to be cliffed
params._vestingCompletePeriod: The complete period during which purchased [bonded] tokens are to be vested

params._contributor: The address of the contributor whose presale contribution is to be refunded
params._vestedPurchaseId: The id of the contribution to be refunded

params._token: Token balance to be sent to recovery vault.

contribute(address,uint256).notice: Contribute to the presale up to `@tokenAmount(self.contributionToken(): address, _value)`

contributionToTokens(uint256).notice: Computes the amount of [bonded] tokens that would be purchased for `@tokenAmount(self.contributionToken(): address, _value)`

state().notice: Returns the current state of that presale

transferToVault(address).notice: Send funds to recovery Vault. This contract should never receive funds,        but in case it does, this function allows one to recover them.
